article.head2: Hello World, my first WikiScriber heading!
article.para: Welcome to WikiScriber! We will introduce the avalible features here:

list.li: ;;lt;head[insert number];;gt;: Creates a heading, supports numbers 1-6, type 1 shouldn't be used however because it's also the title level.
;;lt;link href="[insert link]";;gt;: Creates a link, uses a href parameter for where it goes.
